mapper.select: select tpsr.prob_solve_idx, tti.section_nm, tti.subsection_nm from ai_model_showcase.tb_member_info tmi left join ai_model_showcase.tb_prob_solve_result tpsr on tmi.member_no = tpsr.member_no left join ai_model_showcase.tb_topic_info tti on tpsr.q_idx = tti.q_idx where tpsr.prob_solve_idx = #{prob_solve_idx};
